author: wsjcom
title: Kevin Williamson’s Metaphorical Hanging
text:
As a freshman at Hillsdale College in 2014, I found the Twitter posts over which the Atlantic recently fired Kevin D. Williamson. He had tweeted that women who terminate their pregnancies should be hanged. In “When the Twitter Mob Came for Me” (Review, April 21) Mr. Williamson explains that he was critiquing the rhetoric of the abortion debate despite his own opposition to capital punishment: “The remarkable fact about all this commentary on my supposedly horrifying views on abortion is that not a single writer from any of those famous publications took the time to ask me about the controversy.”
